item.title: US Stock Crypto Concept Stocks Show Mixed Performance in Pre-market Trading, BMNR Up by 2.23%
item.description: On July 23rd, in the pre-market trading of US stock cryptocurrency concept stocks, the results were mixed, including:· Sharplink Gaming decreased by 1.20%;· Circle increased by 1.48%;· Strategy decreased by 0.11%;· Coinbase increased by 0.3%;· HOOD increased by 1.72%;· BMNR increased by 2.23%.

item.title: CNBC: Goldman Sachs and BNY Mellon to Provide Tokenized Currency Market Fund
item.description: On July 23rd, as per the report of CNBC, Goldman Sachs and BNY Mellon are scheduled to announce that they have made it possible for institutional investors to purchase tokenized money market funds. According to executives from both these companies, New York Mellon's clients, being the world's largest custodian bank, will be able to invest in money market funds whose ownership is documented on the Goldman Sachs blockchain platform.This project has attracted a group of fund giants such as BlackRock, Fidelity Investments, Federated Hermes, as well as the asset management divisions of Goldman Sachs and BNY Mellon.Wall Street giants think that following the new law signed by President Trump last week, namely the GENIUS Act, which indicates the arrival of regulated stablecoins in the US, tokenizing the $7.1 trillion money market fund is the next major step forward in the digital asset space. This legislation is anticipated to promote the mainstream adoption of stablecoins (which are typi

item.title: BNB Surges Temporary Above $805
item.description: On July 23rd, based on HTX market data, BNB briefly surged above $805, experiencing a 24-hour gain of 5.28%.

item.title: U.S. Treasury Secretary: Fed's Analysis of Tariffs Is 'a Bit Off'
item.description: On July 23rd, US Treasury Secretary Yellen engaged in a discussion regarding the Federal Reserve's interest rate decision. She expressed uncertainty, stating, "I am not certain about what the Fed is contemplating." Additionally, she opined that the Fed's analysis of tariffs was "a bit inaccurate."Yellen further mentioned that Trump had indicated his intention not to dismiss Powell. When referring to Federal Reserve Chairman Powell, Yellen remarked, "There is no haste to take action."

item.title: U.S. Treasury Secretary: Trade Negotiations with China Back on Track, Not Seeking Decoupling from China
item.description: July 23 - The U.S. Treasury Secretary Yellen declared that we maintain a good relationship with China and are able to proceed to negotiations on more significant issues. The trade negotiations with China have returned to the right track. [We] do not desire to decouple from China; instead, we hope to achieve supply chain de-risking.

item.title: Mining Company MARA to Issue $850 Million Convertible Notes for Further Bitcoin Purchases
item.description: On July 23rd, the Bitcoin mining company MARA Holdings announced the issuance of $850 million in convertible notes with a 0% interest rate. These notes will be used to acquire more Bitcoin (as well as to redeem $50 million of old notes and for general corporate purposes).

item.title: SPK 24-hour Price Increase Widens to 170%, Market Cap Rises to $2.36 Billion
item.description: On July 23rd, according to HTX market data, the 24-hour price surge of SPK has expanded to 170%. It is currently trading at $0.185, and the market capitalization has risen to $2.36 billion.

item.title: Vanadi Coffee has once again increased its Bitcoin holdings by 2 coins, bringing its total holdings to 76 coins.
item.description: On July 23rd, according to NLNico, the Spain-based coffee chain Vanadi Coffee once more augmented its Bitcoin holdings by 2 coins, resulting in a total of 76 bitcoins.

item.title: Bitget Launches Spot Trading Event, Unlocking 50,000 BGB Airdrop
item.description: On July 23rd, Bitget launched the 1st Trading Club Battle. The trading pairs involved include spot trading, spot instant exchange, spot leverage, and small-scale exchange trading. During this event, users who reach the specified cumulative daily buy-in amount will receive corresponding points. There is no limit to the number of points that can be earned. Users who meet the criteria will have the opportunity to unlock a 24,500 BGB airdrop reward.In addition, the user with the highest cumulative buy-in amount will receive a reward of 500 BGB. Users ranked from 2nd to 501st will unlock a 25,000 BGB prize pool. The trading pairs are limited to BTC, ETH, BGB, SOL, DOGE, and other 5 major currencies. The trading amounts of the top 501 users will be announced on the official form at 11:00 (UTC+8) the day after each event day.The event will take place from July 24th, 00:00:00 to July 30th, 23:59:59 (UTC+8).

item.title: Economists unanimously expect the Federal Reserve to keep rates unchanged in July
item.description: On July 23rd: 105 economists reached a unanimous prediction that the Federal Reserve will maintain the federal funds rate within the range of 4.25%-4.50% on July 30th.
